points.name: 1561 celestial phenomenon over Nuremberg
points.description:
Name1561 celestial phenomenon over Nuremberg
DescriptionThe 1561 celestial phenomenon over Nuremberg was a mass sighting of celestial phenomena or unidentified flying objects (UFO) above Nuremberg, Germany that was reported in a broadsheet news article printed in April 1561. The phenomenon has been interpreted by some modern UFO enthusiasts as an aerial battle of extraterrestrial origin.

Original Text:
In the morning of April 14, 1561, at daybreak, between 4 and 5 a.m., a dreadful apparition occurred on the sun, and then this was seen in Nuremberg in the city, before the gates and in the country – by many men and women. At first there appeared in the middle of the sun two blood-red semi-circular arcs, just like the moon in its last quarter. And in the sun, above and below and on both sides, the color was blood, there stood a round ball of partly dull, partly black ferrous color. Likewise there stood on both sides and as a torus about the sun such blood-red ones and other balls in large number, about three in a line and four in a square, also some alone. In between these globes there were visible a few blood-red crosses, between which there were blood-red strips, becoming thicker to the rear and in the front malleable like the rods of reed-grass, which were intermingled, among them two big rods, one on the right, the other to the left, and within the small and big rods there were three, also four and more globes. These all started to fight among themselves, so that the globes, which were first in the sun, flew out to the ones standing on both sides, thereafter, the globes standing outside the sun, in the small and large rods, flew into the sun. Besides the globes flew back and forth among themselves and fought vehemently with each other for over an hour. And when the conflict in and again out of the sun was most intense, they became fatigued to such an extent that they all, as said above, fell from the sun down upon the earth as if they all burned and they then wasted away on the earth with immense smoke. After all this there was something like a black spear, very long and thick, sighted; the shaft pointed to the east, the point pointed west. Whatever such signs mean, God alone knows. Although we have seen, shortly one after another, many kinds of signs on the heaven, which are sent to us by the almighty God, to bring us to repentance, we still are, unfortunately, so ungrateful that we despise such high signs and miracles of God. Or we speak of them with ridicule and discard them to the wind, in order that God may send us a frightening punishment on account of our ungratefulness. After all, the God-fearing will by no means discard these signs, but will take it to heart as a warning of their merciful Father in heaven, will mend their lives and faithfully beg God, that He may avert His wrath, including the well-deserved punishment, on us, so that we may temporarily here and perpetually there, live as his children. For it, may God grant us his help, Amen. By Hanns Glaser, letter-painter of Nurnberg.

The broadsheet was illustrated with a woodcut engraving and text by Hans Glaser (1500 – 1573) who was a printer, block-cutter, woodcut tinter and publisher from Nuremberg in the Holy Roman Empire, known for printing broadsheets, some featuring woodcut illustrations.
The original medieval broadsheet can be viewed in the Central Library in Zurich. The broadsheets would not have been preserved if they had not been carefully collected and preserved by a contemporary from the 16th century: the Zurich pastor Johann Jakob Wick (1522-1588). He received support from Zwinglis successor Heinrich Bullinger (1504-1575).

There is still a heated debate in the scientific community about what these pamphlets really describe. Some speculate that it could have been an extraterrestrial event or some other celestial phenomenon such as an, at that time, unexplained atmospheric phenomenon or even a drug-induced experience or even a mass psychosis which could have been caused or induced by a fungus, growing on grain, that can cause hallucinations.
PlaceNuremberg
CountryGermany

points.name: 1566 celestial phenomenon over Basel
points.description:
Name1566 celestial phenomenon over Basel
DescriptionThe 1566 celestial phenomenon over Basel was a series of mass sightings of celestial phenomena above Basel, Switzerland. The Basel pamphlet of 1566 describes unusual sunrises and sunsets. Celestial phenomena were said to have fought together in the form of numerous red and black balls in the sky before the rising sun.

Original Text:
It happened in 1566 three times, on 27 and 28 of July, and on August 7, against the sunrise and sunset; we saw strange shapes in the sky above Basel. During the year 1566, on the 27th of July, after the sun had shone warm on the clear, bright skies, and then around 9 pm, it suddenly took a different shape and color. First, the sun lost all its radiance and luster, and it was no bigger than the full moon, and finally it seemed to weep tears of blood and the air behind him went dark. And he was seen by all the people of the city and countryside. In much the same way also the moon, which has already been almost full and has shone through the night, assuming an almost blood-red color in the sky. The next day, Sunday, the sun rose at about six oclock and slept with the same appearance it had when it was lying before. He lit the houses, streets and around as if everything was blood-red and fiery. At the dawn of August 7, we saw large black spheres coming and going with great speed and precipitation before the sun and chattered as if they led a fight. Many of them were fiery red and, soon crumbled and then extinguished.

The report itself was written by the Zurich typesetter/printer and art student Samuel Coccius (actually Samuel Koch, born Essig) in the Year 1566, the pamphlet was illustrated and published by the book printer and music publisher Samuel Apiarius (1530 - 1590).
The original medieval pamphlet can be viewed in the Central Library in Zurich. The pamphlets would not have been preserved if they had not been carefully collected and preserved by a contemporary from the 16th century: the Zurich pastor Johann Jakob Wick (1522-1588). He received support from Zwinglis successor Heinrich Bullinger (1504-1575).

There is still a heated debate in the scientific community about what these pamphlets really describe. Some speculate that it could have been an extraterrestrial event or some other celestial phenomenon such as an, at that time, unexplained atmospheric phenomenon or even a drug-induced experience or even a mass psychosis which could have been caused or induced by a fungus, growing on grain, that can cause hallucinations.
PlaceBasel
CountrySwitzerland

points.name: Aguadilla, Puerto Rico, Coast Guard UFO Video
points.description:
NameAguadilla, Puerto Rico, Coast Guard UFO Video
DescriptionErich von Däniken and other organisations received in 2014 an anonymous letter with a video from a Coast Guard Crew in Puerto Rico, near Rafael Hernandez Airport in Aguadilla. An unidentified orange object appeared over an airstrip - diameter of around 2m. The crew was not allowed to land, so the filmed the object. It moved over fields, houses and finally dived into the ocean. After a few secounds two UFOs game out of the water.
PlaceAguadilla
CountryPuerto Rico

points.name: Aurora, Texas Ufo-Crash on the 4.17.1897
points.description:
NameAurora, Texas Ufo-Crash on the 4.17.1897
DescriptionOn the 4.17.1897, an unusual flying Object hit the Windmill and crashlanded on the Property of Judge J.S. Proctor and is reported to have blown up in a terrific explosion that left debris over several acres. The craft debris is said to be a mix of aluminum and a silver metallic substance. It is also said that the debris was dumped into the Proctor s well. Interestingly enough, research of the well by the crew of UFO Files and UFO Hunters with the help of MUFON corroborated reports of the well having been cleaned out, although the well water did contain high amounts of aluminum. The Event was witnessed by the whole Town. MUFON-Investigators were told by Eyewitnesses, that they have seen an Alien Body. There s also an Aurora-Newspaper-Report about the Incident by S. E. Haydon. The Town also held a funeral for the Pilot of the strange Craft and a Tombstone with a depiction of an UFO has been set. The Day after a MUFON-Investigation about the Tombstone and the Grave of the Alien-Pilot, the Tombstone and the Grave were removed by Unknown People. The whereabouts of this Evidence are unknown to this Day.
PlaceAurora
CountryUnited States

points.name: Avril Haines (Director of National Intelligence) talks about Extraterrestrials
points.description:
NameAvril Haines (Director of National Intelligence) talks about Extraterrestrials
DescriptionAvril Haines, Director of National Intelligence (DNI) talks about Extraterrestrials at the Our Future in Space-event at the Washington National Cathedral.
She admitted that there remains things about the strange encounters, which the intelligence community simply does not understand. She highlighted the need for more investigation. She has now become the most senior person in the intelligence community to hint at an alien link.
Avril Haines Quote 1: UFOs buzzing US warships may be aliens as encounters show ‘something we don’t understand.
Avril Haines Quote 2: The main issues that Congress and others have been concerned about is safety of flight concerns and counterintelligence issues and there s also always the question of ‘is there something else that we simply do not understand, which might come extraterrestrially?

It s obvious that more and more renowned scientists, researchers and politicians propose the possibility of extraterrestrial interactions in modern times but also in ancient times. It s imporant that we stay open minded to this possibilty and, if we have the opportunity, try to contribute to this very important research.
PlaceWashington National Cathedral Our Future in Space-Event
CountryUnited States

points.name: Barstow California UFO Landing on the 12.12.2009
points.description:
NameBarstow California UFO Landing on the 12.12.2009
DescriptionResidents of the Town of Barstow reported a UFO hovering over their Homes. Later, the UFO touched down across the Street in the Dessert. Shortly after these Events, black SUVs of an unknown Origin entered the Scene, encircled the UFO with their high-beams pointing outward to blind and distract the People of Barstow. The mysterious Object was quickly removed by loading it onto a big Truck. According to Witnesses, the Object seems to have been about the Size of a VW-Bug (small Car).
There is not much information to be found about this incindent.
If one of our readers knows more about this incident at Barstow on December 12, 2009, please contact us and report it.
PlaceBarstow
CountryUnited States

points.name: Chilean navy declassifies inexplicable UFO footage after 2yr
points.description:
NameChilean navy declassifies inexplicable UFO footage after 2yr
DescriptionNewest released UFO-case from Chilean military. The case has now been declassified after two years of clarifications officially.
PlaceRegion Navidad
CountryChile

points.name: Davies radar approved UFO sighting off shores Korea
points.description:
NameDavies radar approved UFO sighting off shores Korea
DescriptionRichard L. Thompson was an outstanding reasercher in the fields of UFO studies, which are based on facts. In his book „Alien Identities“ in 1993 on page 87 he describes a profound UFO encounter incident, which has been proven with testimonies from the military crew and pilots and radar monitorings, which cant be explained by radar anomalies due to atmospheric conditions for instance. This UFO encounter case he studied has been reported in the book of Richard Hall „The UFO evidence“ which narrates reported UFO cases in the fifties from the military of the U.S of NICAP (National Investigations Committee On Aerial Phenomena).

Here is an excerpt of the case described in the book „Alien Identities“ from Richard L. Thompson:

„An example of a UFO sighting limited strictly to radar occurred off the shores of Korea in the fall of 1951. Lt. Cmdr. M.C. Davies had an encounter with a UFO while deplloyed with an Anti-Submarine Squadron aboard a CVE class carrier. The incident occurred while he was flying at nicht at 5000 feet.

He picked up a target, which had been circling the fleet, on his radar scope. Upon leaving the fleet, it took up a position behind his wingman, flying about 3 miles astern, and held about the same position relative to Daviess plane as the wingman. The ship also reported the target on their radars. After approximately 5 minutes, the target left at a speed of over 1000 mph and was observed on the radar scope by Davies out to 200 miles, the maximum range of his radar. After his flight, Davies learned that the target had been held for about 7 hours, then trail a plane for 5 minutes, and then fly off at a high speed.“

In the unclassified report „Preliminary Assessment: Unidentified Aerial Phenomena“ of the „OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR OF NATIONAL INTELLIGENCE“ published at the 25th June in 2021, five explanations are described which would be responsible for the phenomenon of UAPs, namely these are: „airborne clutter, natural atmospheric phenomena, USG or industry developmental programs, foreign adversary systems, and a catchall “other” bin.“ What if under the last category also extra terrestrial encounters are a realilty and extra terrestrials really exist, flying their space ships around our world? After all many UAPs or UFO sightings have been made from credible sources as entire military crews, proven with their sophisticated equipment and wittnessed live with their own eyes, which would prove that their equipment didnt fail due to any technological anomalies and also certainly no technology on earth from another country has achieved this capabilities nor did any natural atmospheric phenomena occur.
PlaceBusan, Southkorea
CountryKorea

points.name: Evora UFO Sighting
points.description:
NameEvora UFO Sighting
DescriptionOn November 2, 1959, professor Joaquim Guedes do Amaral, director of Évoras Commercial and Industrial School, was informed of the presence of a strange object hovering in the citys skies. Using the magnification of a telescope, the teacher observed in more detail a lenticular-shaped object that would later be accompanied by a second object whose shape and movement patterns did not correspond to any common or known object.

That same day, several sources reported white filaments of unusual texture falling over the city, witnessed even hundreds of kilometers away by pilot Conceição e Silva (later Chief of Staff of the Air Force) who was preparing to rehearse a flight from the Sintra air base. Microscopic analyses of these filaments by Professor Amaral revealed a strange living being, classified as “unknown” by all the biologists who analyzed it. Ufologists call this filament “Angelhair” and it has been witnessed with other possible UFO-cases around the world.

Was this UFO in truth an intergalactic object scattering the seeds of life throughout the universe as the Panspermia Theory suggests? Could it be that the organisms found in the angel hair filament are prototypes for all life in the universe?
PlaceEvora
CountryPortugal

points.name: Ground Observer Force by radar and Pilot approved UFO sighting near Rapid City
points.description:
NameGround Observer Force by radar and Pilot approved UFO sighting near Rapid City
DescriptionRichard L. Thompson was an outstanding reasercher in the fields of UFO studies, which are based on facts. In his book „Alien Identities“ in 1993 on page 87 he describes a profound UFO encounter incident, which has been proven with testimonies from the military crew, pilots and radar monitorings, which cant be explained by radar anomalies due to atmospheric conditions for instance. This UFO encounter case he studied has been reported in the book of Richard Hall „The UFO evidence“ which narrates reported UFO cases in the fifties from the military of the U.S of NICAP (National Investigations Committee On Aerial Phenomena).

Here is an excerpt of the case described in the book „Alien Identities“ from Richard L. Thompson:

„In another case involving combined and radar observation, the Ground Observer Force spotted a UFO hovering in the eastern skies near Rapid City, South Dakota, on August 12, 1953. Ground radar began tracking the object, along with the F-84 that was vectored upon it. The F-84 chased the UFO for 120 miles. As the pilot abandoned the chase, heading back toward the base, the UFO followed him. When another F-84 was scrambled on the object, chasing it for 160 mils, it obtained a radar lock-on (automatically guiding the plane toward the UFO). However, the pilot became frightened and asked to break the intercept when a red light began blinking on his radar-ranging gunsight, indicating that a solid object was ahead of him. The climax of the sighting came when both the UFO and the F-84 were clearly seen on the GCI radar screeen, and the pilot saw a white, unidentified light speeding in front of him. In this case, gun camera photographs supplemented the pilots testimony as to what he saw.“

In the unclassified report „Preliminary Assessment: Unidentified Aerial Phenomena“ of the „OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR OF NATIONAL INTELLIGENCE“ published at the 25th June in 2021, five explanations are described which would be responsible for the phenomenon of UAPs, namely these are: „airborne clutter, natural atmospheric phenomena, USG or industry developmental programs, foreign adversary systems, and a catchall “other” bin.“ What if under the last category also extra terrestrial encounters are a realilty and extra terrestrials really exist, flying their space ships around our world? After all many UAPs or UFO sightings have been made from credible sources as entire military crews, proven with their sophisticated equipment and wittnessed live with their own eyes, which would prove that their equipment didnt fail due to any technological anomalies and also certainly no technology on earth from another country has achieved this capabilities nor did any natural atmospheric phenomena occur.
PlaceRapid City, Souht Dakota
CountryUnited States

points.name: Johnson County - Missouri, UFO-Sighting on the 8.3.2016
points.description:
NameJohnson County - Missouri, UFO-Sighting on the 8.3.2016
DescriptionOn the 8.3.2010, a Father and his Son want to investigate a UFO-Sighting by his elder Son. They camped on the Side of the Hill close to the Whiteman Airforce-Base. They noticed 2 Military-Jets, circling around the Base like searching or chasing something. Suddenly, a dark, triangle-shaped Craft appeared in the Sky. The Father reported that it had 3 pale orange Lights, running around the perimeter and that the Craft made no noise at all. Suddenly the two Military-Jets start persuing the UFO. As soon as they got closer to the UFO, it disappeared. The Two (Father and Son) called Friends and the Family to ask if they saw it to and the Girlfriend has seen the exact same Craft above the Trees. Some more People went up the Hill to see the UFO too. The Scene has turned and suddenly it seems like the UFO is persuing the military Figher-Jets. After these Events, the UFO disappears and Helicopters were seen hovering above the Base.
PlaceKnob Noster
CountryUnited States

points.name: Lonnie Zamora Ufo Incident
points.description:
NameLonnie Zamora Ufo Incident
DescriptionOn April 24, 1964 at approx. 5.45 p.m., Socorro Police Sergeant Lonnie Zamora was pursuing a speeding car south of Socorro, New Mexico when he heard a roar and saw a a flame in the sky, some distance away in the southwest. Zamora first believed that it probably was a local dynamite shack which has exploded and so he discontinued the pursuit and began to investigate the potential explosion. He claimed to have observed a white, shiny object to south about 140 to 180 meters away and initialy believed the object to be an overturned white car. The object was like aluminum but not chrome and shaped like the letter O. Zamora also claimed to have briefly observed two people in white coveralls beside the object, who he later described as possible small adults or large kids. Shortly after this observation, Zamora claimed to hear a roar and see a blue and orange flame under the object which then rose and quickly moved away in the sky. Its important to note that shortly after the incident, other police officers arrived ant they noted patches of smoldering grass and brush.

The incident was investigated by governmental projects (e.g. the U.S. Air Force s Project Blue Book) and civilian ufologists and has been reported in the popular press and media.
PlaceSocorro, New Mexico
CountryUnited States

points.name: Phoenix Lights Arizona
points.description:
NamePhoenix Lights Arizona
DescriptionThe Phoenix Lights (sometimes called the Lights over Phoenix) were a series of widely sighted unidentified flying objects or UFOs observed in the skies over the U.S. states of Arizona, Nevada, and the Mexican state of Sonora on March 13, 1997.
Lights of varying descriptions were seen by thousands of people between 19:30 and 22:30 MST, in a space of about 300 miles (480 km), from the Nevada line, through Phoenix, to the edge of Tucson. There were two distinct events involved in the incident: a triangular formation of lights seen to pass over the state, and a series of stationary lights seen in the Phoenix area. Witnesses claim to have observed a huge carpenters square-shaped UFO, containing five spherical lights or possibly light-emitting engines. Fife Symington, the governor at the time, was one witness to this incident; he later called the object otherworldly. Also, world-famous actor Kurt Russell saw the Phoenix Lights while flying his son to Phoenix.

The big question remains, what did the hundreds of eye-witnesses witness on that day, march the 13th 1997, in phoenix?
PlacePhoenix, Arizona
CountryUnited States

points.name: Rendlesham forest, Bentwater UFO incident
points.description:
NameRendlesham forest, Bentwater UFO incident
DescriptionIn the night of Dec. 26th 1980 the first lightning object has been seen sinking into Rendlesham forest through the trees. Servicemen which located the object, described it as triangular pyramid (2m long, 2.8m high). It was lightning and seemed to be metallic. Sergeant Jim Penniston even touched the object and reported, that it seemed to be organic and not metallic. Next they at daylight, they found broken/fallen tree branches and found three small impressions in a triangular pattern.
PlaceRendlesham Forest Airforce base
CountryUnited Kingdom

points.name: The story of Ezekiel
points.description:
NameThe story of Ezekiel
DescriptionIn the best seller book Chariots of the Gods in 1968 Dr. Erich von Däniken narrates the story of Ezekiel who is mentioned in the bible (chapter 40 in the bible). He describes in his conclusion of the biblical story how Ezekiel, a great temple priest, sighted how a space ship landet in front of him and other people. Also does Mr. von Däniken mention how the so called gods or maybe aliens spoke to Ezekiel and took him with them into the skies inside their space ship up to a mountain far away. He describes how the space ship landed unto a landing platform inside a city and instructed Ezekiel to measure the whole building complex, as described in the bible.

Erich von Däniken had a speech at NASA, where a group of highly qualified space engineers attended his speech and went afterwards for dinner with him. The NASA engineers told Mr. von Däniken that they dont believe in his theory. But the chief development engineer called Josef F. Blumrich told Mr. von Däniken that although he doesnt believe in Mr. von Dänikens theory he agrees to read the chapters of Ezekiel in the bible. Later on NASAs chief engineer Josef F. Blumrich read the story of Ezekiel in many different bibles due to different wordings in different published bibles. Finally he was completely stunned about the story of Ezekiel and agreed with Dr. Erich von Däniken. He then wrote the famous book The Spaceships of Ezekiel in 1974 in where he analyzes and describes his findings about the space ship that Ezekiel probably saw.

The case doesnt end here. In 1985 an engineer called Hans Herbert Beier publishes a book in where he reconstructs the measurements which Ezekiel made of the building. The result is compelling as it clearly shows how the space ship that chief engineer Blumrich designed upon the bible fits exactly inside Mr. Beiers reconstructed building complex from Ezekiels measurements.

Translated excerpt of Ezekiels story in the bible:
It happened in the thirtieth year, on the fifth day of the fourth month, while I was in the river Chebar among the exiles, the heavens opened.... But I saw a storm wind coming from the north, and a great cloud, surrounded by a radiance and an unceasing fire, from the midst of which it was flashed like bright ore. And in the midst of it appeared figures like four living beings appeared, - they were to be seen like the figures of men. And each one had four faces and each had four wings. Their legs
were straight, and the soles of their feet were like the soles of the feet of a calf, and they sparkled like bright brass.... Further I saw next to each of the four living creatures a wheel on the ground. The appearance of the wheels was like the gleam of a chrysolite and the four wheels were all of the same shape and they were worked as if one wheel were in the middle of the other, as if you could walk on all four sides without turning while walking. And I saw that they had rims, and their rims were full of eyes all around on all four wheels. When the living beings walked, so did the wheels beside them, and when the living creatures rose from the ground, the wheels also rose up... and I heard behind me a mighty roar noise behind me, when the glory of the Lord rose up from its place, the rustling of the wings of the living creatures touching each other, and the rattling of the wheels at the same time with them was a tremendous roar.

Is it possible, that Dr. Erich von Däniken, NASA engineer J. F. Blumrich and engineer Beier are right with their theories? If its really god meant in the bible, why would god require a space ship at all?
PlaceBabylon
CountryIraq

points.name: Travis Walton UFO Abduction Case
points.description:
NameTravis Walton UFO Abduction Case
DescriptionThe Travis Walton UFO incident was an alleged alien abduction of American forestry worker Travis Walton by a UFO on November 5, 1975, while he was working in the Apache-Sitgreaves National Forests near Snowflake, Arizona. Walton was missing for five days and six hours. After days of searching with scent dogs and helicopters, Walton says he reappeared by the side of a road near Heber, Arizona. The Walton case received mainstream publicity and remains one of the best-known alien abduction stories.

On November 5, 1975 Walton and six of his coworkers were working with a timber stand improvement crew in the Apache-Sitgreaves National Forest near Snowflake, Arizona. After work, when they decided to drive home in their working-truck, they encountered a saucer-shaped object hovering in the forest, approximately 110 feet away, making a strange blend of low- and high-pitched mechanical sounds. Travis Walton and the other six men claimed that after Travis had approached the object, a beam of blueis light suddenly appeared from the craft and knocked him unconscious. The other six men were frightened and supposedly drove away. Walton claimed that he awoke in a hospital-like room, being observed by three short, bald creatures. He claimed that he fought with them until a human, wearing a helmet, led Walton to another room, where he blacked out as three other humans put a clear plastic mask over his fact. Walton has claimed that he remembers nothing else until he found himself walking along a highway five days later, with the flying saucer departing above him.
PlaceSnowflake, Arizona
CountryUnited States

points.name: UFO Case Bahia Blanca
points.description:
NameUFO Case Bahia Blanca
DescriptionArgentina, on the 21st of May 1962 in the city of Bahia Blanca south of Buenos Aires a UFO mass sighting occured. Many people observed a strange luminous body suspended for several minutes over the city, and then saw it disappear quickly. A local photographer was able to take two pictures of the object, which looks lika a luminous oval on the print.

In the year 1962 many UFO sightings have been observed in entire Argentina, most of them in Bahia Blanca.

This case has been anounced in the news paper “NUEVA PROVINCIA” on May 22 1962 in Argentina. The Cordoba Astronomical observatory has asked the public to submit theirs observations in order to determine wether the phenomenon was a cluster of meteorites, part of an artificial satellite, or due to other causes. This case is one of the reported cases of the CIA UFO documents which were declassified in January 2020 and have been published by John Greenewald Jr on his website theblackvault.com, who recieved all 2700 declassified pages in a PDF on CD from the CIA.
PlaceBahia Blanca
CountryArgentina

points.name: Unknown flying Ball
points.description:
NameUnknown flying Ball
DescriptionI saw a Ballon that doesn`t move for more than 10 minutes. So I decideed to take a photo. The Balloon doesn`t move for the next ten minutes, then it disappears without moving. The picture is madly in a distance of about 10 kilometers.
PlaceDuebendorf
CountrySwitzerland

points.name: Zimbabwe Ariel School UFO Incident
points.description:
NameZimbabwe Ariel School UFO Incident
DescriptionOn September 16, 1994, there was a UFO sighting outside Ruwa, Zimbabwe. 62 students at the Ariel School aged between six and twelve claimed that they saw one or more silver craft descend from the sky and land on a field near their school. One or more creatures dressed all in black then approached the children and telepathically communicated to them a message with an environmental theme.

The children who witnessed the incident were interviewed by several professionals including Cynthia Hind, Tim Leach and Harvard University professor of psychiatry John Mack. Throughout the 1990s Mack had investigated UFO sightings and had a particular interest in the alien abduction phenomenon. According to the interviews of Hind, Leach and Mack, 62 children between the ages of six and twelve claimed to have seen at least one UFO. Not all of the children at the school claimed a sighting. The basic details of the sightings were quite consistent although not all the details were. One or more silver objects, usually described as discs, appeared in the sky. They then floated down to a field of brush and small trees just outside school property. Between one and four creatures with big eyes and dressed all in black, exited a craft and approached the children. At this point many of the children ran but some, mostly older pupils, stayed and watched the approach. According to Macks interviews the creature or creatures then telepathically communicated to the children an environmental message, before returning to the craft and flying away.

Two days prior to the incident at Ariel there had been a number of UFO sightings throughout southern Africa. There had been numerous reports of a bright fireball passing through the sky at night. Many people answered ZBC Radios request to call-in and describe what they had seen. Although some witnesses interpreted the fireball as a comet or meteor, it resulted in a wave of UFO mania in Zimbabwe at the time.
PlaceAriel School, Ruwa, Zimbabwe
CountryZimbabwe
